data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Quetta, Baluchistan, Pakistan.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Quetta, Baluchistan, Pakistan
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 1,001,000 people living in Quetta.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 358 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Quetta to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, help the 2,791 believers in Quetta to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 998,209 lost friends and neighbors.
Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Sorozai people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Quetta. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the county of Quetta prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.section_summary:
the county of Quetta, Baluchistan, Pakistan has a population of 1,001,000.

We estimate Quetta has 2,791 people who might know Jesus, 10,010 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 988,199 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 358 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 988,199, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.
